verses.verse: אַ֥שְֽׁרֵי־ <S%H835><s%> Blessed הָאִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> [is] the man אֲשֶׁ֤ר ׀ <S%H834><s%> who לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nor הָלַךְ֮ <S%H1980><s%> that walketh בַּעֲצַ֪ת <S%H6098><s%> not in the counsel רְשָׁ֫עִ֥ים <S%H7563><s%> of the ungodly וּבְדֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> in the way חַ֭טָּאִים <S%H2400><s%> of sinners לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nor עָמָ֑ד <S%H5975><s%> nor standeth וּבְמוֹשַׁ֥ב <S%H4186><s%> in the seat לֵ֝צִ֗ים <S%H3887><s%> of the scornful לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor יָשָֽׁב׃ <S%H3427><s%> nor sitteth

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for אִ֥ם <S%H518><s%> lo בְּתוֹרַ֥ת <S%H8451><s%> [is] in the law יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> God חֶ֫פְצ֥וֹ <S%H2656><s%> But his delight וּֽבְתוֹרָת֥וֹ <S%H8451><s%> and in his law יֶהְגֶּ֗ה <S%H1897><s%> doth he meditate יוֹמָ֥ם <S%H3119><s%> day וָלָֽיְלָה׃ <S%H3915><s%> and night

וְֽהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> will be like כְּעֵץ֮ <S%H6086><s%> And he shall be like a tree שָׁת֪וּל <S%H8362><s%> planted עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> by פַּלְגֵ֫י <S%H6388><s%> by the rivers מָ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> of water אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> Which פִּרְי֨וֹ ׀ <S%H6529><s%> his fruit יִתֵּ֬ן <S%H5414><s%> that bringeth forth בְּעִתּ֗וֹ <S%H6256><s%> in his season וְעָלֵ֥הוּ <S%H5929><s%> his leaf לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not יִבּ֑וֹל <S%H5034><s%> also shall not wither וְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> Which יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> and whatsoever he doeth יַצְלִֽיחַ׃ <S%H6743><s%> shall prosper

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> are not כֵ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> so הָרְשָׁעִ֑ים <S%H7563><s%> The ungodly כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> but כַּ֝מֹּ֗ץ <S%H4671><s%> [are] not so but [are] like the chaff אֲ‍ֽשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which תִּדְּפֶ֥נּוּ <S%H5086><s%> driveth away רֽוּחַ׃ <S%H7307><s%> which the wind

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֤ן ׀ <S%H3651><s%> after that לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor יָקֻ֣מוּ <S%H6965><s%> shall not stand רְ֭שָׁעִים <S%H7563><s%> Therefore the ungodly בַּמִּשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> in the judgment וְ֝חַטָּאִ֗ים <S%H2400><s%> nor sinners בַּעֲדַ֥ת <S%H5712><s%> in the congregation צַדִּיקִֽים׃ <S%H6662><s%> of the righteous

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יוֹדֵ֣עַ <S%H3045><s%> knoweth יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> For the LORD דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> the way צַדִּיקִ֑ים <S%H6662><s%> of the righteous וְדֶ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> but the way רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> of the ungodly תֹּאבֵֽד׃ <S%H6><s%> shall perish
